mapper.sql: mpmo.matching_order_id, mpmo.matching_order_code, mpmo.work_order_card_pool_id, mpmo.staff_id, mpmo.work_order_quantity, mpmo.production_quantity, mpmo.matching_quantity, mpmo.min_matching_quantity, mpmo.`status`, mpmo.remark, mpmo.organization_id, mpmo.create_user_id, mpmo.create_time, mpmo.modified_user_id, mpmo.modified_time, mpmo.is_delete
mapper.select:
select , su.user_name as createName,su.user_name, bs.staff_code, bs.staff_name, swocp.work_order_card_id, swo.work_order_id, swo.work_order_code, sm.material_id, sm.material_code, sm.material_desc, btt.main_unit, spm.product_model_name from mes_pm_matching_order mpmo LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON mpmo.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON mpmo.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN base_staff bs ON bs.staff_id = mpmo.staff_id LEFT JOIN base_team bt ON bs.team_id = bt.team_id LEFT JOIN smt_work_order_card_pool swocp ON mpmo.work_order_card_pool_id = swocp.work_order_card_pool_id LEFT JOIN smt_work_order swo ON swocp.work_order_id = swo.work_order_id LEFT JOIN smt_material sm ON swo.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_tab btt ON sm.material_id = btt.material_id LEFT JOIN smt_storage_material ssm ON sm.material_id = ssm.material_id LEFT JOIN smt_product_model spm ON btt.product_model_id = spm.product_model_id
and date_format(mppp.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and swo.work_order_code like CONCAT('%', #{workOrderCode}, '%')
and swocp.work_order_card_id like CONCAT('%', #{workOrderCardId}, '%')
and mpmo.matching_order_code like CONCAT('%', #{matchingOrderCode}, '%')
and mpmo.status= #{status}
order by mpmo.create_time desc
